channel.title: #127: SaaS products we use to run our businesses
channel.description:
@freyfogle and I discuss some of the SaaS products we rely on to run our businesses: what they are and why we use them.
<iframe height="200px" width="100%" frameborder="no" scrolling="no" seamless src="https://player.simplecast.com/ba7c3b08-275a-4616-959a-bd31922278b4?dark=false"></iframe>
Thanks to EmailToolTester who sponsored this episode. Find which email newsletter service actually reaches your customers with [EmailToolTester’s deliverability report](https://emailtooltester.com/deliver).
You can also [listen to and download this episode here](https://bootstrapped.fm/2020/02/28/127-saas-products-we-use-to-run-our-businesses/).

item.title: #127: SaaS products we use to run our businesses
item.dc:creator: unboot
item.description:
Thanks for this episode.

@SteveMcLeod 2 questions:

  1. Have you thought of making a page “FeatureUpvote vs. competitor” and try to rank it next to the ads of your competitor?
  2. What is the web translation service you use? I could not clearly understand the name. Asking because I might use poedit or an online service like weblate.org.

Read full topic
